entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 6:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: W 47 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
